etymology.interpretation: 貝 signals the idea of value or treasure, pointing toward the sense of being worthy. 臤 provides the sound, while the combined sense evokes someone esteemed like money was in antiquity.
etymology.simplification: Simplified from 賢 by replacing 臤 with 𰀡 and 貝 with 贝 to reduce strokes and regularize components; the bottom follows the common 贝 simplification of the ‘cowry/money’ element.

examples.chinese: 贤明的领导带来改变(賢明的領導帶來改變)。
examples.english: A wise and virtuous leader brings change.
